snippet.title: Desynced - Official Announcement Trailer | 4K
snippet.description:
Desynced: A sci-fi survival strategy game where you gather, build, explore and fight to survive using fully customizable units and behaviors. Explore and automate or die. Research new technology, discover an AI on the brink of self-awareness and step into the Blight to uncover the truth of this world.

Wishlist on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1450900/Desynced/?utm_source=yt_announce

Keep up to date with the latest information
https://desyncedgame.com/

Join the conversation on Discord
https://discord.gg/vJzMxBTFFP

#gaming #strategy #survival
